import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function Address() { const bookId=useParams() const [address,setAddress]=useState({ bookName:'', bookImg:'', bookAuthor:'', bookPrice:'', customerName:'', customerMobileNo:'', customerAddress:'' }) function loadWishlist() { axios.get(`http://localhost:9090/cart/get/${bookId}`).then(res=>{setAddress(res.data)}).catch(err=>{console.log(err)}) } useEffect(()=> { loadWishlist() },[]) const handleChange=(e)=> { setAddress({...address,[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const handlePlaceOrder=()=> { axios.post('http://localhost:9090/address/add',address) } return (

) } export default Address
